eu.europa.esig.dss.asic

Class ASiCParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.europa.esig.dss.asic.ASiCParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ASiCParameters
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class regroups the signature parameters related to ASiC form.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
